name: SOS OPS!
description:
Your beloved town is in danger!

Stay alert 24/7 to keep the situation in the town under control. No fires or lost cats allowed.

Ok, you've received the emergency call.

No worries. Just start your engines and HURRY UP, YOU LAZY #*$%#@*&$#&*!

You can try to fight the fire.

It's not that simple, and sometimes it can be a little dangerous, but people believe in you.

Or you can play football.

Yes, it's an emergency situation, but the ball seems so lonely here.

The cats are lonely too.

Grab them and find them a suitable place to live.



Contact us: media@artdock.studio
